activities: CBS takes data provided by consumers in the UK, via online registeration application forms to provide customer with access to services and products.
personaldata: On-Line & Off-Line And Manually Processed Data
recoursemech:
If you have a complaint, please contact us at legal@creditbenefitservices.com or Credit Benefit Services, LLC, Portsmouth Technopole, Kingston Crescent, Portsmouth, PO2 8FA. We will investigate your complaint. We will attempt to both resolve your complaint through investigation and to respond to you with the outcome.
If you are not happy with our final response, you have the right to have your complaint dealt with by the ICO. To do so, you should contact ICO within 6 months of our final response to your complaint. We have agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union data protection authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor principles.
